input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to play with an angel oracle?
input_text.Response A: Sure!  An angel oracle is a tool that allows you to ask an angel for guidance and receive an angelic message in response.  To use the oracle, you’ll first need to clear your mind and heart of negative energy, then ask a question of the angel and wait for a response.  There are many different types of angel oracles, but a common method is to use a deck of angel oracle cards.  You can buy angel oracle cards at many New Age stores, or you can make your own by creating oracle cards with angelic images.  Once you have your cards, you can use them to do a reading by laying out the cards in a pattern and then interpreting the meaning of the cards.  To clear your mind and heart, you might want to meditate, do some deep breathing, or say a prayer.  Next, choose
input_text.Response B: There are many different angel oracle decks available. Each deck will have instructions on how to play with the cards. Generally, you shuffle the cards and choose one or more cards to gain insight or guidance. Some decks may have specific spreads or layouts to use, while others may require you to use your intuition to interpret the cards. It's important to be open to the messages and guidance that come through when working with angel oracle cards.
